Translations.Text: hageye, imranara putri maryam, tanna manavannu kapadikondiddalu. Navu adarolage (akeya garbhadolage) nam'ma atmada bhagavannu udidevu. Akeyu tannodeyana vacanagalu hagu granthagalu satyavendu samarthisuvavalagiddalu mattu akeyu vidheyalagiddalu
avanu samrd'dhanu. Adhipatyavu avana kaiyallide mattu avanu ellavannu madalu saktanagiddane
Nim'malli yaru satkarmagalannu maduvarendu pariksisalu, avanu marana mattu jivanavannu srstisiruvanu. Avanu bahala prabalanu ksamasilanu agiruvanu
avanu elu akasagalannu kramabad'dhavagi srstisiruvanu. A parama dayaluvina srstiyalli yava kundu ninage kanisadu. Innom'me nodu, ninage dosavenadaru kanisuttideye
mattom'me tirugi, eraderadu bari nodu, ninna drstiyu sotu, danidu ninnattale marali baruvudu
navu ihalokada akasavannu (naksatragalemba) dipagalinda alankarisiruvevu mattu avugalannu saitanarige hodeyuva sadhanagalagisiruvevu. Mattu navu avarigagi bhugileluva benkiyannu siddapadisittiruvevu
tam'madeyanannu dhikkarisidavarige narakada sikse sigalide mattu adu tumba hina neleyagide
avarannu adarolage hakaladaga avaru adara arbhatavannu keluvaru mattu adu kudiyuttiruvudu

adu avesadinda innenu sphotagolluvudo, embantiruvudu. Avarallina yavudadaru tandavannu adarolage hakaladaga adara dvarapalakaru avarodane ‘‘eccarisuvavaru nim'ma balige bandiralillave?’’ Endu keluvaru

avaru heluvaru; ‘‘yakilla? Eccarisuvavaru nam'ma balige khandita bandiddaru. Adare navu avarannu tiraskarisidevu mattu allahanu enannu kaluhisikottilla, nivu maha mosakke silukiruvirendu heliddevu’’ ennuvaru
mattu avaru heluvaru; ‘‘ondu vele navu (dutara sandesavannu) keliddare mattu adannu artha madikondiddare (indu) navu narakadavara salalliruttiralilla
hige, avaru tam'ma papavannu oppikolluvaru. Adare narakadavaru sapagrastaragiruvaru
tam'ma odeyanannu kannare kanadeye avanige anjikondiddavarige ksame ide mattu maha pratiphalavide
Nivu nim'ma matannu guttagidiri athava adannu bahirangapadisiri. Avanantu manas'sugalolagina vicaragalannu ballavanagiddane
srstisidavanenu ariyadiruttaneye? Avanu tira suksma visayagalannu ballavanu mattu arivullavanagiddane
avane bhumiyannu nim'ma palige samatattagisidavanu. Nivu adarallina darigalalli nadeyiri mattu avanu odagisiruva aharavannu sevisiri. Konege avana baliye matte jivantagollabekagide
nivenu, akasadalliruvavanu nim'mannu bhumiyalli hutubiduva hagu adu (bhumiyu) hathattane nadugalarambhisuva (sadhyateya) kuritu niscintaragiruvira
athava akasadalliruvavanu nim'ma mele, kallu tumbida birugaliyannu bisi biduva (sadhyateya) kuritu nivu niscintaragiruvira? Nanna eccarike entahadembudu nimage begane tiliyalide
avara hindinavaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisiddaru. Hegittu nanna sikse

tam'ma mele haraduttiruva paksigalannu avaru nodalillave? Avugalu tam'ma rekkegalannu haradikondu iruttave, avugalannu madacikondu iruttave. Avugalannu adharisi kondiruvavanu, a parama dayaluvina horatu beraru alla. Avanu khandita ellavannu noduttiruttane
a parama dayaluvina virud'dha nimage neravagaballa yava pade tane nim'ma bali ide? Dhikkarigalu nijakku mosakkolagagiddare
avanu nimage tanna kadeyinda ahara odagisuvudannu nillisi bittare yariddane nimage ahara odagisuvavanu? Nijavagi avaru (dhikkarigalu) vidroha mattu vidvesada dhoranege antikondiddare
tanna mukhavannu nelakkoragisikondu elutta bilutta nadeyuvavanu heccu sanmargadalliruvano athava nera margadalli nettage nadeyuvavano
Heliri; avane nim'mannu srstisidavanu, nimage kivigalannu, kannugalannu, manas'sugalannu nididavanu. Adare nivu krtajnate sallisuvudu matra tira kadime
heliri; avane nim'mannu bhumiyalli haradidavanu mattu avana baliye nim'mannu ottu serisalaguvudu
‘‘nivu satyavantaragiddare, (lokantyada) a vagdana ideruvudu yavaga?’’ Endu avaru keluttare
heliri; adara jnanavu allahana bali ide. Mattu nanu kevala spastavagi eccarisuvavanu matra
nijavagi adu (lokantyada samayavu) hattira baruvudannu kandaga dhikkarigala mukhagalu vikara golluvavu. Aga avarodane, ‘‘nimage vagdana madalagiddudu idanne’’ endu helalaguvudu
(dutare,) heliri; nivu cintisi nodidira? Allahanu nannannu hagu nanna jotege iruvavarannu nasa madidaru nam'ma mele karune toridaru, dhikkarigalannu kathina sikseyinda yaru tane raksisa ballaru
heliri; navu a parama dayaluvannu nambiruvevu mattu avanalliye bharavase ittiruvevu. Yaru spastavagi dari gettavanembudu nimage begane tiliyalide
heliri; nivu cintisi nodidira? Nivu balasuva niru ingi hodare yariddare, nimage sihi nirina cilumegalannu tandu koduvavaru
nun – lekhaniya mattu avara (malak‌gala) barahada ane
(dutare,) nim'ma odeyana anugrahadinda nivu huccarenalla
nimage, endu mugiyada pratiphalavu sigalide
nivu khandita atyunnata mattada caritravantaru
sighrave nivu noduviri mattu avaru noduvaru –
– nim'ma paiki huccanu yarendu
tanna dariyinda dura saridavanu yarembudannu cennagi ballavanu a nim'ma odeyanu. Yaru sari dariyalliddare embudannu avane ballanu
nivu sullugararannu anusarisabediri
nivu tusu mrdu dhorane talidare tavu mrduvagabekendu avaru apeksisuttiddare
Nivu khandita anusarisabedi – pade pade pramana maduva nicanannu
dusisutta nindisutta tirugaduvatanannu
satkaryakke kharcu madadavanannu, atireka vesaguva papiyannu
ugra svabhavadavanannu, caritrahinanannu
tanna bali sampattide mattu putrariddarendu (avanu ahankarisuttane)
avanige nam'ma vacanagalannu odi kelisaladaga ‘‘avella gatakalada kathegalu’’ ennuttane
sighrave navu avana mugina mele bare eleyaliddeve
hinde totadavarannu pariksisidante navu avarannu pariksisiddevaste. ‘‘Navu adara (a totada) beleyannu nale munjane khandita koyyuvevu’’ endu avaru pramana madi ghosisiddaru
innondu sadhyateyannu avaru prastapisalilla. (‘Allahanicchisidare’ ennalilla)
avaru nidrisuttiddagale nim'modeyana kadeyinda adara (a totada) melondu vipattu banderagitu
belagaguva hottige adu bele koyda holadantagi bittitu
beligge avaru paraspararannu kugi kareyalarambhisidaru
‘‘nimage phala koyyalikkiddare munjavinalle nim'ma totavannu talupiri’’ (enna todagidaru)
hige, avaru horataru mattu avaru guttagi matanadikolluttiddaru
‘‘indu yava bada vyaktiyu nim'ma balige baradante nodikolli’’ (endu)
avaru, tavu bhari saktarendu bigutta horataru
konege avaru, adannu (totavannu) kandaga, ‘‘navu dari tappiddeve’’ ennatodagidaru
‘‘nijavagi, navu bhagyahinaru’’ (endu kelavaru helidaru)
avarallina santulita vyaktiyobbanu helidanu; ‘‘(higaditendu) nanu nimage heliralillave? Niveke (allahana) pavitravannu japisuvudilla?’’
Marudina (munjane) avaru helidaru; ‘‘nam'ma odeyanu pavananu. Navu khandita akramigalagiddevu’’
a balika avaru paraspararannu dusisalu arambhisidaru
Avaru helidaru; ‘‘ayyo nam'ma daurbhagyave, navu elle miri bittiddevu’’
‘‘nam'ma odeyanu namage idakkinta uttamavadudannu nidabahudu. Navu nam'modeyanedege oliyuttiddeve’’
higiruttade, nam'ma sikse. Paralokada sikseyantu idakkinta hiridagiruttade. Adannu avaru aritiddare cennagittu
dharmanistharigagi, avara odeyana bali anugrahagalu tumbida udyanagalive
navenu, muslimarige (saranadavarige) mattu aparadhigalige onde gatiyannu odagisuveve
nimagenagide? Nivu adentaha tirmanagalannu kaigolluttiri
nim'ma bali nivu oduva divya granthavenadaru ideye
adaralli nimage istaviruva ellavu siguttideye
athava nivu tirmanisiddannella navu nimage kottu bidabekendu, punarut'thanada dinadavaregu navu palisale bekada kararannu nivu nam'minda padediruvira
avara paiki adara honeyannu vahisikondavaru yarendu avarodane keliri
athava avara bali (devatvada) paludararu iddareye? Avaru satyavantaragiddare a tam'ma paludararannu hajarupadisali
halahala merediruva (punarut'thanada) dina, sastangaveragalu avarannu kareyalaguvudu. Adare avarige adu sadhyavagadu
bhayadinda avara drstigalu taggiruvavu mattu apamanavu avarannu avarisiruvudu. I hinde avaru svastharagiddaga sastangaveragalu avarannu kareyalagittu. (Avaru adannu kadeganisiddaru)
nannannu bittu bidi. I sandesavannu tiraskarisidavanannu nanu (allah) nodikolluvenu. Avarige arive illadante navu kramena avarannu hididukolluvevu
sadya nanu avarige kalavakasa koduttiddene. Nanna yojaneyu khandita balisthavagiruttade
(dutare,) nivenu avarodane enadaru sambhavaneyannu keliruvira? Mattu avaru adara bharadadiyalli naraluttiddareye
Athava avara bali, avaru barediduttiruva gupta jnanavenadaru ideye
(dutare,) nivu nim'modeyana adesa baruva tanaka sahanasilaragiri. Mattu nivu mininavarante (yunusarante) agadiri. Avaru bahala nonda sthitiyalli (allahanige) more ittiddaru
avara odeyana anugrahavu avarige neravagade iddiddare avaru tira ketta sthitiyalli ondu batta bayalige eseyalpaduttiddaru
avara odeyanu avarannu aydukondanu mattu avarannu sajjanara salige serisidanu
(dutare,) dhikkarigalu upadesavannu kelidaga tam'ma drstiyindale nim'mannu nuccunuru maduvaro embante nim'medege noduttare mattu ‘‘avanu khandita hucca’’ ennuttare
nijavagi, idu sarvalokagaligagi iruva ondu upadesavagide
naija sambhava
enadu naija sambhava
nimagenu gottu, a naija sambhavada kuritu
samud mattu ad janangadavaru a hathat sambhavavannu allagaledaru
konege samudarannu sidilige tuttagisi nasa madalayitu
innu, ad‌rannu tivra vegada birugaliyondara mulaka nasa madalayitu
adannu satata elu ratri hagu entu dinagala kala avara mele heralayitu. Mattu alliddavarellaru tollada kharjurada kandagalo embante sattu biddiruvudu nimage kanisuttittu
avara paiki ulidiruva yaradaru nimage kanisuttiddareye
phir‌aun hagu avaniginta hindinavaru mattu budamelada nadinavaru aparadhagalannu esagiddaru
avaru tam'ma odeyana (allahana) dutara adesagalannu miri nadedaga avanu avarannu bahala kathoravagi dandisidanu
pravahavu mitimiridaga navu nim'mannu hadagige hattisidevu
adannu nim'ma palige smarakavagisalikkagi mattu nenapiduva kivigalu adannu nenapidalendu
kahaleyannu ondu bari udidaga
bhumiyannu parvatagalannu melakkettalaguvudu mattu averadannu pudigatti om'mege nelasamagolisalaguvudu
Andu sambhavisalide, a naija sambhava
akasavu biridu biduvudu mattu andu adu tira durbala vagiruvudu
malak‌galu adara suttalu iruvaru, mattu a dina entu mandi (malak‌galu) nim'modeyana pithavannu tam'ma mele hottiruvaru
andu nim'mannu (ellara munde) hajarupadisalaguvudu mattu nim'ma yava visayavu guptavagi uliyadu
karmapatravannu balagaiyalli nidaladavanu (itararodane) heluvanu; ‘‘ido nanna karmapatravannu odiri’’
‘‘nanu nanna vicaraneyannu khandita edurisabekaguvudu endu nanu modale nambidde’’
avanu dharala sukhahdalliruvavanu
ettaravada svarga totagalalli
alliya hannina goncalugalu bagiruvavu
(avarodane helalaguvudu;) kaledu hoda dinagalalli nivu madidda karmagala phalavagi (indu) moju madutta tinniri hagu kudiyiri
karma patravannu edagaiyalli nidaladavanu heluvanu; ‘‘ayyo, nanage nanna karmapatravu sigade iddiddare cennagittu!’’
‘‘Mattu nanna phalitansa enembudu nanage tiliyade iddiddare cennagittu’’
‘‘ayyo, a nanna maranave antimavagiddare cennagittu’’
‘‘indu nanna sampattininda nanage yava labhavu illa’’
‘‘nanna adhikaravellavu nanninda kaledu hogide’’
aga adesisalaguvudu; avanannu hidiyiri mattu nogavannu todisiri
mattu avanannu narakada benkige esedu bidiri
mattu avanannu eppattu gaja uddada sankoleyalli bigidu kattiri
avanu mahonnatanada allahanalli nambike ittiralilla
mattu avanu badavarige unisuvudakke yarannu prerepisuttiralilla
indu, avanigilli mitraru yaru illa
kivina horatu bere yava aharavu avanige dakkadu
mattu adannu aparadhigala horatu bere yaru tinnalararu
nanu nimage kanuva vastugala ane haki heluttiddene
Mattu nanu nimage kanada vastugala ane haki heluttiddene
khanditavagiyu idu obba gauravanvita dutana matu
idu yavude kaviya matalla. Adare nivu nambuvudu matra kadime
idu yavude mantrikana matalla. Nivu patha kaliyuvudu tumba kadime
idu sakala lokagala odeyanu ilisi kottiruva sandesa
ondu vele avaru (dutaru) nam'ma kuritu enadaru sullu heluttiddare
navu avara balagaiyannu hidiyuttiddevu
mattu navu avara jivanadiyannu kattarisi biduttiddevu
nim'ma paiki yarigu nam'mannu tadeyalu sadhyaviralilla
idu (i granthavu) khandita dharmanisthara palige ondu upadesavagide
nim'ma naduve sullugararu iruva kuritu namage tilidide
khanditavagiyu idu, dhikkarigalu paritapisuvudakke karanavagalide
idu nis'sandehavagiyu nambalar'ha satyavagide
nivu mahonnatanada nim'ma odeyana namada pavitravannu japisiri
prasnisuvavanobbanu, (dhikkarigala mele) khandita banderagaliruva sikseya kuritu prasnisiddane
dhikkarigala mele adu banderaguvudannu nivarisalu yarindalu sadhyavagadu
atyunnata sthanagala odeyanada allahana kadeyinda (adu baralide)
aivattu savira varsagalastu dhirghavagiruva ondu dina, malak‌galu mattu ruh (jibril) avanedege eri hoguttare
(dutare,) sadya nivu sanyama toriri. Sabhyavada sanyama
avaru adannu (vicaraneya dinavannu) tumba duradalli kanuttiddare
adare navu adannu tira hattiradalli kanuttiddeve
akasavu karagida tamradantaguva a dina
parvatagalella unneya curugalantagi biduvavu
(andu) yava mitranu tanna mitrana kuritu vicarisalaranu
nijavagi, avaru paraspararannu noduttiruvaru
andu aparadhiyu siksege pariharavagi tanna putrarannu nidalu siddanaguvanu
(Matravalla,) tanna patni mattu tanna sahodararannu tanage asraya nidida tanna kutumbavannu
mattu bhumiyalliruva ellarannu (pariharavagi kottu) sikseyinda paragalu bayasuvanu
khandita illa. Adu, bhugideluva benkiyagiruvudu
carmavannu sulidu biduva benki
satyavannu kadeganisi doddastike meredavanannu adu (narakavu) kareyuvudu
sampattannu sangrahisi muccittavanannu (adu kareyuvudu)
khanditavagiyu manavanannu cancalanagi srstisalagide
sankastavenadaru eduradodane avanu gabarigolluttane
sukha praptavadaga jipunanagi biduttane
adare namajh sallisuvavaru matra (hagiruvudilla)
avaru sada kattunittagi namajhannu palisuttare
avara sampattugalalli nirdistavada hakku ide
beduvavanige mattu vancitanige
pratiphalada dinaviruvudu satya endu avaru nambuttare
avaru tam'modeyana siksege anjuttare
avara odeyana sikse entahaddendare, a kuritu niscintaragiralu sadhyave illa
avaru tam'ma manavannu kapadikolluttare
tam'ma patniyaru mattu dasiyara visayadalli matra avaru khandanar'haralla
adara acinadannu apeksisuvavaru – avare elle miruvavaru
avaru (svargakke ar'harada sajjanaru) tam'mannu nambi oppisalada honegalannu nibhayisuttare mattu tam'ma kararugalannu palisuttare
avaru tam'ma saksagalalli sthiraragiruttare
avaru tam'ma namajh‌gala kuritu eccara vahisuttare
avare, gauravanvitaragi svarga totagalalli iruvavaru
idenagide dhikkarigalige? Avareke nim'medege dhavisi baruttiddare
balabhagadindalu edabhagadindalu gumpu gumpagi baruttiddare
avara paiki pratiyobbaru anugraha tumbida svargadolage pravesisalu asisuttiddare
Khandita sadhyavilla. Avarige tilidiruva ondu vastuvininda nave avarannu srstisiruvevu
khandita illa. Nanu purvagala mattu pascimagala odeyana ane haki heluttiddene, navu khandita adannu madaballevu
avara sthanadalli navu avariginta uttamarannu taraballevu. Yaru nam'mannu solisalararu
avarannu bittu bidiri. Avaru, tamage vagdana madalagiruva dinavannu edurisuva tanaka, nirarthaka kelasagalalli mattu ata vinodagalalli nirataragirali
avaru, tam'ma gorigalinda eddu hora baruva dina, ondu nirdista guriyedego embante aturaragi dhavisuttiruvaru
avara drstigalu bhitavagiruvavu mattu apamanavu avarannu avarisi kondiruvudu. Aduve avarige vagdana madalagidda dina
‘‘nim'ma janangadavara mele kathina sikseyu banderaguva munna avarannu eccarisiri’’ ennutta navu nuharannu avara janangadedege kaluhisidevu
avaru (nuh) helidaru; ‘‘nanna janangadavare, nanu nimage spasta munneccarike niduvavanagiddene’’
‘‘nivu allahanannu aradhisiri, avanige anjiri mattu nanna adesa palisiri’’

‘‘avanu (allahanu) nim'ma papagalannu ksamisuvanu mattu ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka nimage kalavakasa niduvanu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu niscayisiruva samaya bandu bittare adannu nivarisalaguvudilla. Nivu idannu aritiddare estu cennagittu
avaru (nuh) helidaru; ‘‘nannodeya, nanu hagalirulu nanna janangadavarannu (satyadedege) karediddene’’
‘‘adare nanna kareyu (satyadinda) avara palayanavannaste hecciside’’

‘‘ninu avarannu ksamisalendu nanu avarannu amantrisidagalella avaru tam'ma beralugalannu tam'ma kivigalolage turuki kondaru hagu tam'ma vastragalannu tam'ma mele eledu kondaru mattu avaru ud'dhatatana toridaru hagu bhari ahankara pradarsisidaru’’
‘‘Nanu avarannu kugi karedenu’’
‘‘bahirangavagiyu guptavagiyu nanu avarige upadesisidenu’’
‘‘nanu avarodane helidenu; nivu nim'ma odeyana bali ksame keliri. Avanu khandita ksamisuvavanagiddane’’
‘‘avanu nim'ma mele akasadinda dharala maleyannu surisuvanu’’
‘‘sampattu hagu santatigala mulaka avanu nimage neravaguvanu mattu nimagagi totagalannu racisuvanu hagu nimagagi nadigalannu harisuvanu’’
‘‘nimagenagide? Nivu allahaninda yavude gauravavanneke niriksisuvudilla?’’
‘‘Avanu vividha hantagalalli nim'mannu srstisiruvanu’’
‘‘nivu nodillave, allahanu yava riti kramabad'dhavagi elu akasagalannu srstisiruvanendu?’’
‘‘Mattu yava riti avanu avugalalli belakagi candranannu hagu dipavagi suryanannu nirmisiruvanendu?’’
‘‘Allahane nim'mannu bhumiyinda belesidanu’’
‘‘avanu matte nim'mannu adarolakke maralisuvanu mattu adarindale nim'mannu hora tegeyuvanu’’
‘‘allahanu nimagagi bhumiyannu hasinantagisiruvanu’’
‘‘- nivu adarallina visala darigalalli sancarisuvantagalu’’
nuharu helidaru; ‘‘nannodeya, avaru nanna matannu keluttilla. Yarige tam'ma sampattu mattu santanagalinda nasta matra agideyo, anthavarannu avaru anusarisuttiddare’’
‘‘avaru bhari sancugalannu hudiddare’’
‘‘mattu avaru – nim'ma devarugalannu khandita kai bidabedi. Vadd annagali suva'a annagali yagus, ya'uk mattu nasr‌rannagali kai bidabedi – ennuttiddare’’
‘‘nannodeya, avaru anekarannu darigedisiruvaru. Ninu i akramigalannu mattastu dikkugedisi bidu.’’
Konege, avara aparadhagala karana, avarannu niralli mulugisalayitu mattu benkiyolage eseyalayitu. Aga allahana horatu avarige yava sahayakaru sigalilla
Mattu nuharu helidaru; ‘‘nannodeya, dhikkarigala paiki obbanannu bhumiyalli jivanta bittu bidabeda’’
‘‘ninu avarannu bittu bittare avaru ninna dasarannu darigedisuvaru mattu avara santatigalu kevala dustaru krtaghnaru agiruvaru’’
‘‘nannodeya, nanagu nanna hettavarigu visvasigalagi nanna maneyolage bandiruvavarigu ella visvasi purusarigu striyarigu ksameyannu nidu mattu akramigalige vinasada horatu berenannu heccisabeda’’
(dutare,) heliri; nanna balige divya sandesavu bandide. (Adara prakara,) jinn‌gala ondu tandavu idannu (i kur‌anannu) keli, higenditu; ‘‘navu ondu visista kur‌anannu keliruvevu’’
‘‘adu sanmargavannu torisuttade. Navu adaralli nambike ittiruvevu. Navinnu nam'ma odeyana jote yarannu paludararagisalarevu.’’
‘‘Nam'ma odeyana sthana tumba unnatavadudu. Avanu yarannu tanna patni athava putranagisi kondilla’’
‘‘nam'mallina kelavu murkharu allahana kuritu sullugalannu srstisi heluttare’’
‘‘jinn‌galu mattu manavaru allahana kuritu sullu heluvudilla endu navu nambiddevu
‘‘kelavu manavaru jinn‌gala asraya padedudarinda avara (jinn‌gala) bandayavu mattastu heccitu’’
‘‘allahanu yarannu matte jivantagolisalaranendu nivu nambiruvante avaru (a jinn‌galu) nambiddaru’’
‘‘navu akasavannu samiksisi nodidevu. Adannu balistha kavalugararu raksisuttiruvudannu hagu adu benkiyinda tumbiruvudannu kandevu’’
‘‘hinde navu suddi kelalikkagi alli halavede kuruttiddevu. Adare iga, hage kela horatavanu, tanna mele benkiya daliyannu edurisa bekaguttade
‘‘bhuvasigala odeyanu avarige enadaru ahitavannu madabayasuttano athava hitavannu madabayasuttano embudu namage tiliyadu’’
‘‘Nam'malli kelavaru sajjanariddare mattu itara bageyavaru iddare. Nam'malli vibhinna panthagalive’’
‘‘bhumiyalli allahanannu solisalu nam'minda sadhyavilla mattu avaninda tappisikolluva mulaka avanannu manisalikku nam'minda sadhyavilla embudannu navu managandiddeve
‘‘margadarsi sandesavannu (kur‌anannu) kelidodane navu adannu nambidevu. Tanna odeyanannu nambidavanige yavude nastada athava akramada bhaya iruvudilla’’
‘‘nam'malli kelavaru saranadavariddare (muslimariddare) mattu kelavaru darigettavariddare. Saranadavaru sanmargavannu padedaru’’
‘‘innu papigalu, avarantu narakada indhanavagibittaru’’
(dutare,) ondu vele avaru (makkahda bara piditaru) nera margadalle iddiddare navu avarige kudiyalu dharala nirannu odagisuttiddevu –
– a mulaka avarannu pariksisalikkagi. Tanna odeyana smaraneyannu kadeganisuvatanannu avanu (allahanu) kathina siksege olapadisuvanu
masjid (masidi)galella allahanige serive. Avugalalli allahana jote bere yarannu prarthisabedi
allahana dasanu (dutaru, ka'aba:Dalli) avanannu prarthisalikkendu nintaga avaru (makkahda vigraharadhakaru) atana mele mugidu bilalu horaduttare
heliri; nanantu nanna odeyanannu matra prarthisuttene mattu nanu avana jote yarannu palugolisuvudilla
heliri; nimage yavude nasta athava labhavannuntu maduva adhikara nanage khandita illa
heliri; allahanigeduragi nanage asraya nidaballavaru yaru illa, mattu nanu avana horatu berellu asrayavannu kanuvudilla

allahana kadeyinda (sikkiddannu) mattu avana sandesagalannu talupisuvudu (iste nanna kelasa). Allah mattavana dutara ajnegalannu ullanghisidavarige khandita narakagniye gati. Avaru adaralli sada kala iruvaru

– avaru tam'ma odeyana sandesavannu talupisiruvarembudannu ariyalikkagi. Mattu avanu, avara bali iruva ellavannu avarisikondiruttane. Mattu avanu pratiyondu vastuvannu enisittiruttane

Nim'ma odeyanige khandita tilidide; nivu mattu nim'ma jotegiruva kelavaru, kelavom'me ratriya sumaru murane eradu bhagavannu, innu kelavom'me ardha bhagavannu matte kelavom'me murane ondu bhagavannu (namajh‌nalli) nintukondu kaleyuttiri. Allahane ratri mattu hagalannu rupisidavanu. Adannu (i adesavannu) bahukala palisalu nimage sadhyavagadembudu avanige tilidide. Addarinda avanu nim'ma mele daye toriruvanu. Nivinnu kur‌an‌ninda, sulabhavagi odalu sadhyavaguvastannu odiri. Nim'malli kelavaru rogigaliddare, innu kelavaru allahana anugrahavannarasutta bhumiyalli sancarisuttiruttare mattu kelavaru allahana margadalli horatanirataragiruttare. Addarinda nivu, adarinda (kur‌anininda) sulabhavagi odabahudadastannu odiri hagu namajhannu palisiri, jhakatannu pavatisiri. Mattu allahanige satkarmagala salavannu nidiri. Nivu nimagagi munde kaluhisiruva pratiyondu satkarmavannu allahana bali kanuviri. Aga adu innastu uttama rupadalliruvudu mattu bhari pratiphaladayakavagiruvudu. Allahanalli ksameyacisiri.
